Test Case Name: Home Page re-load actions from menus
Location Path: OUR_CLIENT > Home Page UI v2 (New UI) > Home Page - General
Step Description: From the left-hand menu, click the customer logo and verify that the Home Page reloads.
After clicking the customer logo, verify that all previously expanded or collapsed sections remain in the same state.
From the left-hand menu, click "Home" and verify that the Home Page reloads.
After clicking "Home," verify that all previously expanded or collapsed sections remain in the same state.
Open a Matter, then from the TOP "Current Case" menu, select "Close" and verify that the Home Page reloads.
After closing the Matter, verify that all previously expanded or collapsed sections remain in the same state.
Note: Do not use "Unlock" in the Matter menu, as it navigates to the Matter Search screen instead of the Home Page.
Open an Entity or Participant, then from the TOP "Current Participant/Entity" menu, select "Close Participant/Entity" and verify that the Home Page reloads.
After closing the Entity or Participant, verify that all previously expanded or collapsed sections remain in the same state.
Note: Do not use "Unlock" in the Entity menu, as it navigates to the Entity Search screen instead of the Home Page.

Test Case Name: Top Banner - Current Entity and Current Matter banner items will be displayed when the user has a record open
Location Path: OUR_CLIENT > Home Page UI v2 (New UI) > Home Page - General
Step Description: Hide the ‘Current Entity’ (Current Participant) and ‘Current Matter’ (Current Case) banner items if the user does not have an open Entity or Matter record.
Show ‘Current Entity when the user has an Entity record open Show ‘Current Matter’ when the user has a Matter record open
